text:
San Francisco, CA – Onsite – FT – Data Engineers and Lead Data Scientists

Metromile is changing the car insurance industry with pay-per-mile insurance. You could think of us as the David to the auto insurance industry's Goliath.

We are hiring for Data Engineers and Lead-level Data Scientists.

Full job descriptions:

1) Data Engineer: https://boards.greenhouse.io/metromile/jobs/897343#.WiG3orQ-... 2) Lead Data Scientist: https://boards.greenhouse.io/metromile/jobs/931305#.WiG4FrQ-...

Contact: mchamberlain@metromile.com with your resume or any questions.
